name: Despair, Destroy and Repair
description:
Play with a friend to reath the goal together. Both characters have each an unique ability. Had you the ability to destroy or to repair, only cooperation will get you both to the next level.

Controls:

Xbox controller:

X/B - Action

A-Jump

Y - Restart Level

Dpad/Joystick - Move

Keyboard:

Player1:

asdw - move

C-action

W-Jump

Player2:

jkli - move

N-action

I-Jump
